title: Are Kindred (Wolf and Lamb) homosexuals?
body: I was practicing my drawing by doing a quick sketch of wolf from the splash art, and I realized something.  If you examine the art creatively, wolf is wearing the lamb mask and lamb is wearing the wolf mask.  So, wolf x lamb? But I'm pretty sure lamb is a young boy.  Eww.  Not that I'm homophobic or anything but eww.

replies.body: Lamb is female, Wolf is male... and it seems like both or them are Asexual.
I don't think the aspects of Death really...have sex.  With anything.
I would assume they are not sexual beings at all.

Although the original question was really dumb, it did bring something to mind. I remember either Jaredan or Ant in Oz saying that Lamb knows all but feels nothing (Omniscient), where as Wolf feels all and knows nothing (Omnipathetic). Which would mean that wolf feels every emotion including love and lust. That would mean that he could feel the same feelings as a homosexual at least. However, although he feels those emotions, I don't think those emotions are his, so I would say he's gay or straight or anything for that matter.
Wow maybe read the lore and understand what you are drawing. They are parts of a person that split himself into 2.
So wolf is a cupid version of lamb then?

(It's Death that Split Himself in two, Making Wolf and Lamb.)
Wolf is no lesser than Lamb in lore.
Wolf is male and Lamb is Female, They are also Asexual.
Wolf is for those who run away from Death.
Lamb is for those who accept death.
Pretty sure Lamb is a Female and Wolf is a Male....
